attributes.action: Stop Genocide of Tamils by the Srilankan Government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We kindly request you to consider the critical situation of the Tamils in Sri Lanka. We want to bring to your attention, that an action of genocide is currently accruing upong the Tamil people. 
The Tamil people in Sri Lanka are currently facing mass amount of destruction due to the civil war. Tamil civilians are being killed, many are injured and far more are homeless. Due to the lack of medical and food supplies the injured are unattended and homeless are unfed. 
Please do something in your power to stop this civil war and bring peace and freedom to Tamil people. 

Thank you!

Yours Truthfully,

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
